description: A base makeup applied to the face to create an even, uniform color and cover flaws.
A cosmetic used to mask dark circles, age spots, and other skin imperfections.
A cosmetic applied to the face to set foundation and reduce shine.
A cosmetic used to add color to the cheeks and emphasize cheekbones.
A cosmetic used to accentuate features by reflecting light.
A powder or liquid used to give skin a sun-kissed glow.
A cosmetic applied to the eyelids to enhance or contour the eyes.
A cosmetic used to define the eyes by drawing a line around the contours.
A cosmetic applied to eyelashes to darken, thicken, and define them.
A cosmetic pencil used to fill in and shape eyebrows.
A cosmetic product containing pigments, oils, and waxes for coloring lips.
A cosmetic product used to give lips a glossy shine and sometimes subtle color.
A pencil used to define and shape the lips before applying lipstick.
Tools used to apply and blend makeup products.
A teardrop-shaped sponge used to apply and blend foundation and concealer.
A liquid spray used to set makeup and help it last longer.
A base applied before makeup to help it adhere better and last longer.
Makeup used to define and enhance facial structure by creating shadows.
Color Correcting cream used to address issues like redness or sallowness.
Beauty Balm or Blemish Balm cream that combines skincare and light coverage.
A product used to remove makeup from the skin.
Artificial lashes applied to enhance the appearance of natural eyelashes.
A tool used to curl eyelashes before applying mascara.
A collection of multiple makeup colors in a single case.
Eyeliner in liquid form for precise application.
Eyeliner in gel form, typically applied with a brush.
Blush in cream form for a dewy, natural finish.
A translucent powder used to set liquid or cream makeup.
Pre-moistened towels used to remove makeup quickly.
Products used to neutralize skin discolorations before applying foundation.
